document.full_text: a 26 year-old former marine is under arrest on suspicion of beating and sexually assaulting a woman inside a concourse at denver international airport, police said on wednesday.
document.title: ex-marine held in alleged rape at denver airport
lines_and_colors: a 26 year-old former marine is under arrest on suspicion of beating and sexually assaulting a woman inside a concourse at denver international airport, police said on wednesday.
